    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseHandler
    The DatabaseHandler class manages all interactions with the SQLite database used by the NHL Stat Tracker application.
    FileHandler
    The FileHandler class provides functionality to load and save Player data from and to a text file.
    FileHandlerTest
     
    Main
    The Main class serves as the entry point for the CLI version of the NHL Stat Tracker application.
    NHLTrackerGUI
    The NHLTrackerGUI class provides a graphical user interface for the NHL Stat Tracker application.
    Player
    Represents an NHL player with their associated statistics such as Name, Team name, goals, assists, and plus/minus.
    PlayerTest
     
    StatManager
    The StatManager class acts as the business logic layer for the NHL Stat Tracker system.
    StatManagerTest
